name: The Fantasy Orphanage
description:
At night, children in the orphanage still want to play, and the dean is intended to  bring them back to sleep.

When children wear the custume they see the world differently, and trash becomes toys in their sight. The children team should take a total of 10 toys to win, and the dean should sober them from naughty and avoid them from takng the rubbish with them for 5 minutes.
